translations.english: Marquis Zhong of Heyang passed away.
In autumn, seventh month, on the day xinhai, Chancellor He passed away.

translations.chinese: 三年春，發長安六百里內男女十四萬六千人城長安，三十日罷。
translations.english: In the third year, spring, he mobilized 146,000 men and women within six hundred li of Chang'an to wall Chang'an. After thirty days they stopped.

translations.chinese: 以宗室女為公主，嫁匈奴單于。
translations.english: He made a princess from the imperial clan and married her to the Xiongnu Chanyu.

translations.chinese: 夏五月，立閩越君搖為東海王。
translations.english: In summer, fifth month, he established Lord Yao of Minyue as King of Donghai.
